amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to create sex-neutral physical fitness standards for combat MOS' and to add 2 additional combat MOSs.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to create sex-neutral physical fitness standards for combat military occupational specialities and adds two additional combat military occupational specialities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waltz amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 216 (Roll no. 274).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waltz amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 216 (Roll no. 274).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
